entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the morning then cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 10 April 2023
